mapper.select: SELECT A.${paramMap.keyCd}, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.${paramMap.keyNm}, (SELECT SUM(qty) FROM ${paramMap.tableNm} WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = '${paramMap.planYn}' AND qty ${paramMap.sign} 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN '${startDt}' AND '${endDt}' ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM ${paramMap.tableNm} WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = '${paramMap.planYn}' AND qty ${paramMap.sign} 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN '${startDt}' AND '${endDt}' GROUP BY ${paramMap.keyCd} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.${paramMap.keyCd} = A.${paramMap.keyCd} GROUP BY A.${paramMap.keyCd}, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm

SELECT A.shipCd, A.shipDt, A.sessionCnt, F.prodNm, C.prodCd, C.inOutSeq, (D.qty * -1) qty, G.totalQty FROM ( SELECT shipCd, shipDt, COUNT(shipCd) sessionCnt FROM tblShipping WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = '${paramMap.planYn}' AND shipDt BETWEEN '${startDt}' AND '${endDt}' GROUP BY shipCd, shipDt ) A
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT shipCd, inOutSeq FROM tblShipPlan WHERE flagYn = 'Y' GROUP BY shipCd, inOutSeq ) B ON B.shipCd = A.shipCd
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT shipCd, inOutSeq FROM tblShipItems WHERE flagYn = 'Y' GROUP BY shipCd, inOutSeq ) B ON B.shipCd = A.shipCd
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) C ON C.inOutSeq = B.inOutSeq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND qty < 0 ) D ON D.inOutSeq = B.inOutSeq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) F ON F.prodCd = C.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.shipCd, SUM(D.qty * -1) as totalQty FROM tblProductInOut D LEFT JOIN (
SELECT shipCd, inOutSeq FROM tblShipPlan WHERE flagYn = 'Y'
SELECT shipCd, inOutSeq FROM tblShipItems WHERE flagYn = 'Y'
) B ON B.inOutSeq = D.inOutSeq WHERE D.flagYn = 'Y' AND D.qty < 0 GROUP BY B.shipCd ) G ON G.shipCd = A.shipCd GROUP BY A.shipCd, A.shipDt, F.prodCd, F.prodNm, C.inOutSeq, G.totalQty ORDER BY A.shipCd DESC;

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'Y' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'Y' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'Y' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'Y' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.shipDt, A.shipCd, A.sessionCnt, B.inOutSeq, C.inOutDt, F.prodCd, F.prodNm, IFNULL(B.cnt, 0) cnt, (IFNULL(D.inQty, 0) + IFNULL(E.outQty, 0)) qty, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblShipping WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'Y' AND qty < 0 AND shipDt = #{shipDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT shipCd, shipDt, COUNT(shipCd) sessionCnt FROM tblShipping WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'Y' AND shipDt = #{shipDt} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT shipCd, inOutSeq, COUNT(*) cnt FROM tblShipPlan WHERE flagYn = 'Y' GROUP BY shipCd, inOutSeq ) B ON B.shipCd = A.shipCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) C ON C.inOutSeq = B.inOutSeq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) inQty, prodCd FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 GROUP BY prodCd ) D ON D.prodCd = C.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) outQty, prodCd FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 GROUP BY prodCd ) E ON E.prodCd = C.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) F ON F.prodCd = C.prodCd ORDER BY A.shipCd DESC;

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt = #{inOutDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.shipDt, A.shipCd, A.sessionCnt, B.inOutSeq, C.inOutDt, F.prodCd, F.prodNm, IFNULL(B.cnt, 0) cnt, (IFNULL(D.inQty, 0) + IFNULL(E.outQty, 0)) qty, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblShipping WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND shipDt = #{shipDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT shipCd, shipDt, COUNT(shipCd) sessionCnt FROM tblShipping WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND shipDt = #{shipDt} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT shipCd, inOutSeq, COUNT(*) cnt FROM tblShipItems WHERE flagYn = 'Y' GROUP BY shipCd, inOutSeq ) B ON B.shipCd = A.shipCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) C ON C.inOutSeq = B.inOutSeq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) inQty, prodCd FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 GROUP BY prodCd ) D ON D.prodCd = C.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) outQty, prodCd FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 GROUP BY prodCd ) E ON E.prodCd = C.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) F ON F.prodCd = C.prodCd ORDER BY A.shipCd DESC;

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, A.qty, A.sessionCnt, D.prodNm, ( SELECT SUM(qty) FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} ) totalQty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, inOutDt, SUM(qty) qty, COUNT(prodCd) sessionCnt FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY prodCd, inOutDt ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd GROUP BY A.prodCd, A.inOutDt, D.prodNm, A.qty, A.sessionCnt

SELECT A.prodCd, A.prodNm, A.protectedQty, IFNULL(D.inQty, 0) inQty, IFNULL(E.outQty, 0) outQty, (IFNULL(D.inQty, 0) + IFNULL(E.outQty, 0)) qty FROM ( SELECT prodCd, prodNm, protectedQty FROM tblProduct WHERE flagYn = 'Y' ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) inQty, prodCd FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 GROUP BY prodCd ) D ON D.prodCd = A.prodCd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(qty), 0) outQty, prodCd FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty < 0 GROUP BY prodCd ) E ON E.prodCd = A.prodCd WHERE A.protectedQty > (IFNULL(D.inQty, 0) + IFNULL(E.outQty, 0))

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(inOutDt, '%Y-%m-%d') date, SUM(qty) totalQty FROM tblProductInOut WHERE flagYn = 'Y' AND planYn = 'N' AND qty > 0 AND inOutDt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(inOutDt, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY inOutDt
